post.summary: Returns the free / booked times for given experiment.

Combined.description: If true, show only one timetable per device instead of one for all available physical devices.

onlyOwn.description: (private) Show only devices of this institution. Give an error if a device of an other institution is requested.

Device.title: Device
Device.description: A device might either be a physical/virtual device or a group of device.

ID.description: Unique ID of the device. Contains the institution (by having an end point at that institution)

Experiment.title: Experiment
Experiment.description: An experiment describes a set of devices and how they should be connected (potentially among other metadata).

Devices.description: List of devices used in experiment.

Description.description: User provided description, for example might be a reason for the booking (e.g. maintenance) or a link to the experiment. Might be empty or missing.

Timeslot.title: Timeslot
Timeslot.description: A time slot represents a slice of time used for bookings.

Booking.title: Booking
Booking.description: A booking in the booking system.

Type.description: Type of booking. Currently, only one type is defined, but others might follow (e.g. priority booking). If empty, 'normal' is assumed.

Status.description: Current status of the booking. While the booking is pending, it can not be used. Will change automatically and can not be set by user. 'rejected' is set when the initial booking failed, 'cancelled' when the booking was deleted / cancelled after it was once active. The 'active-*' will be used when a device was added after the booking was locked.

You.description: If true, this booking was done by you.

External.description: Shows whether the booking was done by an external institution.

Message.description: User readable notes about the status of the booking (e.g. if devices are unknown).

description.description: Extended description of the device, features, etc.

availability.title: Availability
availability.description: A list of time slots that the maintainer of the device announced it is available

connected.description: If true, the device is connected to the service and can be used.

description.description: Extended description of the device, features, etc.

repeat.description: If specified the time slot is repeated in a fixed offset specified by the frequency

until.description: Up to this date-time the time slot will be repeated.

count.description: How often the time slot will be repeated

role.description: The name of the device's role.
The name of the participant's role.

update_information.title: UpdateInformation
update_information.description:
Information regarding an update. Contains the id of the device,
the name of the latest version and a link to it.

device_changed_url.name: changedUrl
device_changed_url.description:
**An URL that will be called once the device changes.**

Once the device was given a changedUrl parameter the contained URL will be called every time a device is changed
as long as every callback resolves with a successful status code.

If the callback fails the url MIGHT not be called in the future.

There can be multiple callbacks registered with the same device.

flat_group.name: flat_group
flat_group.description: If true the returned device group will only contain concrete devices. I.e. any subgroups will be flattend.

closed_url.name: closedUrl
closed_url.description: An URL that will be called once the peer connection is closed.

status_changed_url.name: statusChangedUrl
status_changed_url.description: An URL that will be called if the status of the peerconnection changes.

experiment_changed_url.name: changedURL
experiment_changed_url.description: An URL that will be called when the experiment status changes.
